sentence.Network_en: By studying the way people behave, we can theorize about what is going on in their mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过研究人们的行为方式，我们可以从中推断他们内心的想法。

sentence.Network_en: It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data.
sentence.Network_cn: 在得到这些事实之前就加以推测,那是最大的错误.

sentence.Network_en: To theorize in advance of the facts biases one's judgment.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果未查明事实即先立论[推理],判断难免失之于偏颇.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇后缀 - 豆丁网 ... crystallize 变成晶体， 结晶 theorize 建立理论， 理论化 calvinize 传播、 宣传卡尔文.

list.abs: some researchers theorize that the REM , or rapid movement , phase of sleep is when the brain produces and consolidates neural networks for memory and cognition .一些研究人员提出，大脑在快速动眼睡眠期会产生并巩固形成记忆和认知的神经元。
不可讳言，我的历史研究肇始于将历史理论化 (theorizing history) 的意图。从这种立场出发研究历史的社会学家，不可避免的会碰上历 …

consequently , a historical review of the development of OTs functions as a pragmatic substitute of normative theorization in defining the boundary and contents of this field .对组织理论历史发展的回顾和评论构成了对于组织的边界和内容进行规范理论界定的实用替代。
some theorize that it was as a temple honor earth gods , while others believe that it a burial ground for ancient kings and noblemen .有一个理论说这是供奉大地之神的庙宇，另有人相信这是古代王公贵族的陵墓。

entry.tran: 从理论上说明;建立理论
entry.def: If you theorize that something is true or theorize about it, you develop an abstract idea or set of ideas about something in order to explain it.

example.ex: Police are theorizing that the killers may be posing as hitchhikers...
example.tran: 警方推测那些杀手可能会假装成搭便车的人。

example.ex: By studying the way people behave, we can theorize about what is going on in their mind.
example.tran: 通过研究人们的行为方式，我们可以从中推断他们内心的想法。

means.word_mean: 1. to believe especially on uncertain or tentative grounds;

sentences.sentence: "Scientists supposed that large dinosaurs lived in swamps"
"Galileo theorized the motion of the stars"

auth_sentence.content: Some theorize that Cydonia once bordered an ancient ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some theorize that Cydonia once bordered an ancient ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some theorize that Cydonia once bordered an ancient ocean.

auth_sentence.content: He did not theorize without regard to facts and experience.
auth_sentence.res_content: He did not theorize without regard to facts and experience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He did not theorize without regard to facts and experience.

auth_sentence.content: Now I suppose you might theorize that blackberry put a backdoor in their encryption software.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now I suppose you might theorize that blackberry put a backdoor in their encryption software.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now I suppose you might theorize that blackberry put a backdoor in their encryption software.

means.word_mean: 创建理论,建立学说;推理
